directions: Mix corn, Cheddar cheese, creamy salad dressing, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, red onion, milk, and black pepper together in a bowl. Fold corn chips into salad right before serving to retain crunch.
ingredients: 1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
1/4 cup corn chips (such as Fritos®), or to taste
title: Frito® Corn Salad
